All-Day Comfort

The desk chair’s modern profile offers a professional look for any office, while smooth contours and adjustable settings allow for all-day comfort.

Adjustable Features

Featuring pneumatic controls for raising and lowering the seat, position tilt mechanism, and a tilt-tension knob for adjusting the chair’s motion.

Bonded Leather

Upholstered in bonded faux leather, the chair features a padded backrest and seat with curved nylon armrests with padding for added comfort.

Rolling Caster Wheels

Set on a sturdy 5-point base, you can pivot between projects and enjoy smooth mobility with the chair’s durable rolling caster wheels.

Organize and Contain Supplies

Keep office supplies easily accessible and contained with Amazon Basics mesh desktop organizers for pens and pencils, sticky notes, files and more.

Steel Mesh Construction

With a modern look, the organizers and bins feature a modular steel mesh design that that can be mounted to the wall or set on a desk or tabletop.

Powder-Coated Finish

Featuring a sleek, durable powder-coated finish, the Amazon Basics mesh office line resists chipping and scratches, and stand up to daily use.

Workplace Solutions

Foldable Exercise/Play Pet Pen

Give pets a secure space of their own this versatile, portable play pen. Available in small to large sizes, and with or without a door.

Durable Metal Wire Design

Unscented Dog Waste Bags

Reliable Strength

Product dimensions: 28 x 34 inches (LxW, overall)

Amazon Basics Leak-Proof Dog and Puppy Potty Training Pee Pads

Versatile Convenience

The pee pads are great for puppy potty training, as well as incontinent senior dogs, post-surgery use or travel. Multiple sizes available.

5-Layer Leak-Proof Design

The pads feature a quick-dry surface, a surge layer, a sponge-like core that turns liquid into gel, a locking layer, and a protective plastic lining.

Built-in Attractant

Made with a built-in attractant, dogs are drawn to the pad when nature calls, which supports faster and more successful potty training for puppies.

Disposable

Once used, the pad’s absorbent design and leak-proof liner make cleanup easy. Simply gather up and throw away the pad, and lay down a new one.

Price: $47.99
(as of Nov 29,2022 01:03:36 UTC – Details)


An Amazon Brand.
Cross cut shredder turns paper into small pieces (0.2 x 1.9 inches; 5 x 47 mm); meets security level P-3 standards
Shreds up to 8 sheets of 20-pound bond paper at a time, including staples and small paper clips; 8.7-inch-wide entry
Destroys credit cards one at a time, through the dedicated slot
4 mode control switch (auto/on, off, reverse, forward) and LED status indicators for power on and overheat
3 minute runtime; 30 minute cool down; if runs beyond max run time, it automatically shuts off to prevent overheating
Handle for easily lifting up the shredder head when it’s time to empty the 4.1 gallon bin
Quality tested: as part of Amazon Basics quality inspections, we test every shredder before shipping it, which means you may see some paper shreds from the testing

Amazon Basics Cross-Cut Paper & Credit Card Shredders

Cross-Cut Shredder

More secure than a strip-cut shredder, this cross-cut shredder slices diagonally in both directions to destroy paper, credit cards and more.

Easy Start

In Auto (on) mode, shredding begins once the machine detects something to be shredded, and then it stops automatically when shredding is complete.

Reverse Function

The reverse function makes it possible to retrieve un-shredded or partially shredded documents, plus helps prevent paper jams.

Thermal Protection for Safety

The shredder will automatically shut off to protect the motor if it runs beyond its maximum run time or begins to over-heat.
